headline: Edna’s Selected to Exhibit at INFRA’s 2025 Tabletop Show—Raising the Bar on Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Cocktails
summary: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, July 17, 2025--Coming off a successful rotation with Costco Wholesale (NASDAQ: COST) in Western Canada and strong sales across over 700 Target Corporation (NASDAQ: TGT) stores nationally, Edna’s Non-Alcoholic Cocktail Co. is proud to announce its selection for the 2025 INFRA Tabletop Buying Show. headline: Better Stock to Buy Right Now: Costco vs. Home Depot
summary: With an unmatched customer value proposition, Costco continues to grow its same-store sales.  Demand for Home Depot’s wares has taken a hit, but management is making moves to grow its business with professional contractors and tradespeople.  Two top retail companies that come to mind are Costco (NASDAQ: COST) and Home Depot (NYSE: HD).

headline: Dairy giant New Zealand endures butter price shock
summary: Butter prices have soared in dairy export giant New Zealand, latest figures showed Thursday, with local supplies cut short as the industry chases fatter profits overseas.But while New Zealand consumers were feeling the price pinch, the overall economy was benefiting as exporters creamed off larger profits from sales overseas.

raw.headline: Dairy giant New Zealand endures butter price shock

headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks for Long-Term Investors
summary: The best-performing stocks typically have robust sales growth, increasing margins, and rising returns on capital, and those that can maintain this trifecta year in and year out often become the legends of the investing world.

raw.headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks for Long-Term Investors
